meanings.definition: Not presented or given as an option.
meanings.sent1: The unoffered gift remained hidden in the closet.
meanings.sent2: The unoffered opportunity to travel abroad was disappointing.
meanings.sent3: The unoffered dessert made the dinner party feel incomplete.
meanings.sent4: Her unoffered apology hung in the air, waiting to be acknowledged.
meanings.sent5: The unoffered prize gleamed enticingly, tempting the participants.

meanings.definition: Not provided or made available for acceptance or rejection.
meanings.sent1: The unoffered job position left many applicants puzzled.
meanings.sent2: The unoffered assistance left the struggling student feeling lost.
meanings.sent3: The unoffered discount code expired before anyone could use it.
meanings.sent4: His unoffered help would have been greatly appreciated in that situation.
meanings.sent5: The unoffered solution to the problem remained elusive to the team.
